About ğŸ‘ï¸â€ğŸ—¨ï¸Â¶

z-brains identify patient-specific anomalies in brain morphology and microstructure, using features with previously demonstrated potential to accurately localize epileptogenic lesions.


Core development team ğŸ§ Â¶

z-brains is developed by members of the MICA-lab (https://mica-mni.github.io) and collaborators at the McConnell Brain Imaging Centre of the Montreal Neurological Institute and Harvard Medical School.
